revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #32 Pamtre |image = [[File:Pamtre.png]] |caption = This Berry drifted from a faraway sea. It is now cultivated in the Sinnoh region. |growtime = 5h 0m 0s |harvest = 31 berries |replant = 10% |points = 950 |flavor =
*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Pamtre''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Cornn]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of dry and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Cornn]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 50 mins || 2 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 4 hours 33 mins 20 secs || 5 hours - 10 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours -
10 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 3 hours 20 mins -
6 hours 40 mins || 40 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 13 mins 20 secs -
4 hours 26 mins 40 secs || 27 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Pamtre berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Cornn.png|30px]]
